name: Exa.io
overview:
Exa provides cloud rendering services for animation studios, engineering houses and freelances. With Exa’s GPU accelerated servers, animators are able to enjoy upto 300x speedup in the rendering process compared to their machines, without needing to build an expensive in-house workstations.

Rendering is the process of computing raw data into 3D models composing photo-realistic 3D scenes and animations.

Exa enables accessibility to tremendous computing power instantly and on demand; users can simply upload their project, and get it rendered at the fraction of time and cost.

Recently, we have graduated from SeedStartup, a startup accelerator based in Dubai. We are in private Beta, and tuning our service with the help of well-known animation studios from the MENA region.
